summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an unidentified recipient regarding a court subpoena served on the recipient's office for an upcoming criminal trial, seeking to discuss compliance questions.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email, reaching out regarding a subpoena served on the recipient's office for an upcoming criminal trial in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Court Subpoena Issued
events.description: A court subpoena was served on the recipient's office in connection with an upcoming criminal trial in the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

locations: United States District Court for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: A subpoena was served on an office in connection with an upcoming criminal trial in the Southern District of New York.
The subpoena appears to have been issued by or related to Sacramento County, as indicated by the attachment filename.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney is following up regarding compliance questions with the subpoena.
